      • isFileReadable

        public static boolean isFileReadable(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Checks if an input file can be read. The file must contain some data.
        Parameters:
        file - Input file to read
        Returns:
        True if the file can be read, false otherwise.

      • isFileWritable

        public static boolean isFileWritable(java.nio.file.Path file)
        Checks if an output file can be written. The file does not need to exist.
        Parameters:
        file - Output file to write
        Returns:
        True if the file can be written, false otherwise.
